data.title: Software Engineering Intern  @ Hack+
data.description: Hack+ supports organizations and events with legal backend, banking services, equipment, and more. Developed client portal for finances and logistics management.

data.title: Machine Learning Researcher @ UCSB
data.description: Architected a convolutional neural network EEG-based authentication system with P300 event-related potential as input by using PyTorch and Jupyter Notebooks.

data.title: Network Theory Researcher @ Caltech
data.description: Researched methods on clustering using crowdsourced data with antagonistic actors using MATLAB and studied algorithms in network theory.
